text.0: may we be free from every bond Ādityas a castle among gods and men ye vasus.
text.1: winning may we win varuṇa and mitra and being may we be o earth and heaven.
text.2: may varuṇa and mitra grant this blessing our guardians shelter to our seed and offspring.
text.3: let us not suffer for anothers trespass nor do the thing that ye o vasus punish.
text.4: the everprompt aṅgirases imploring riches from savitar the god obtained them.
text.5: so may our father who is great and holy and all the gods accordant grant this favour.
